remarks: Alternate definition of supremum of a subset of the Hilbert lattice. Definition of supremum in Proposition 1 of [Kalmbach] p. 65.  We actually define it on any collection of Hilbert space subsets, not just the Hilbert lattice ` CH ` , to allow more general theorems. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2002.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hsupval2 $p |- ( A C_ ~P ~H -> ( \/H ` A ) = |^| { x e. CH | U. A C_ x } ) $.
$d A x $.
